definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
see 注音符號|注音符号[zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4]
thirty six initial consonants of Song phonetic theory
word that contains one or more letters of an alphabet (e.g. HSK, PK, WTO, PO文, PM2.5, γ射線|γ射线)

sentences.english: YOLO is an acronym for "you only live once".
sentences.chinese: YOLO是“你只活一次”的英文首字母縮寫。

sentences.english: We have several word letters that uses a series of forms to input into the doc.
sentences.chinese: 我們有幾個字母詞使用到文檔形式輸入一個系列。

sentences.english: Atoms must start with a lower case character, or you can delimit with single quotes.
sentences.chinese: 原子值必須以小寫字母開頭，否則需要加上單引號。

sentences.english: The minimum number of alphanumeric characters in a password.
sentences.chinese: 密碼中字母數字字符的最小數目。
它有27個字母，意思類似於“充滿了榮耀”。

sentences.english: Only the initial letter in the first word of any complimentary close is capitalized.
sentences.chinese: 任何結尾謙稱用語都只大寫第一個字的第一個字母。

sentences.english: Mongolia and Russia, based on the use of Cyrillic alphabet text.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古和俄羅斯境內的使用斯拉夫字母爲基礎的文字。

sentences.english: We need a sentence letter, what should we have?
sentences.chinese: 我們與要一個句子的字母，應該是哪個呢？

sentences.english: Her initials were enchased on the monument.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字縮寫字母刻在紀念碑上。

sentences.english: Lettered words has the qualifications to enter Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 字母詞有資格進入漢語詞典。

sentences.english: The letters SW1 stand for a postal district of London.
sentences.chinese: SW1這幾個字母代表倫敦的郵政分區。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents any non-upper case character.
sentences.chinese: 前跟轉義字符用於表示任意非大寫字母的字符。

sentences.english: Less common letters, like J and K, were moved off that row.
sentences.chinese: 較不常用的字母，像J和K，就從這行裏移走了。

sentences.english: The Greeks learned the Phoenician alphabet by trading with them.
sentences.chinese: 希臘人通過和腓尼基人的貿易學會了腓尼基字母。

sentences.english: The first letter of a phrase or song refrain.
sentences.chinese: 避免用一個詞組或一首歌名的首字母。

definition: Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
capital letters/uppercase letters/block letters/banker's anti-fraud numerals
